abstract.p: List of some contractors in Manhattan willing to redesign kitchen for $20,000 or less including labor (S)

block.p: IN Manhattan, it's easy to find cabinets and appliances, but hard to find a contractor who is professional and willing to work on a kitchen for $20,000 or less including labor. Here are seven contractors, carpenters and cabinetmakers who will work within those restraints, and who are recommended by the designers of the seven kitchens.
The $12,000 kitchen with solid walnut counters: Willy Rios, a carpenter, custom-made the walnut counters and installed the walnut veneer. Information: (201) 951-8580.

IN Manhattan, it's easy to find cabinets and appliances, but hard to find a contractor who is professional and willing to work on a kitchen for $20,000 or less including labor. Here are seven contractors, carpenters and cabinetmakers who will work within those restraints, and who are recommended by the designers of the seven kitchens.
The $12,000 kitchen with solid walnut counters: Willy Rios, a carpenter, custom-made the walnut counters and installed the walnut veneer. Information: (201) 951-8580.

The $17,000 high-tech kitchen: Anthony Simnowski, a general contractor, built the entire kitchen, including the cabinetry and floors and installing the laboratory countertops. Information: (914) 478-1741.
The $5,000 midcentury-modern kitchen: Eugene Miles, a general contractor, installed the cabinetry and butcher block counters. Information: (718) 789-8099.
The $30,000 barrier-free kitchen: Stephen Iino, a cabinetmaker, custom-made the ash and maple cabinetry. Information: (212) 678-7895.
The $19,000 kitchen with Kartell's rolling cabinets: Jerry Lesteratos, a general contractor, did the estimates. Information: (212) 505-0834.
The $17,000 transparent kitchen: John Martin, a general contractor, did the estimates. Information: (718) 661-9390.
The $18,000 tile kitchen: Angelo's Home Improvement, a general contractor, did the estimates. Information: (718) 518-7248.
Ikea's hanging glass-fronted kitchen cabinet ranges in price from $61 to $324 a unit. Stores: (800) 434-4532.
Expo Design Center has 27 kitchens, and cabinetry ranges in price from $224 to $1,400 a lineal foot. Stores: (678) 581-8500.
